about_the_game:
Super Sized Rescue Squad is a fast paced 2D platformer inspired by games like "Jill of the Jungle" and "Choplifter". You play as Wendy Aettridge, a young cargo plane pilot who is thrust into an international conflict when her plane is shot down by an evil cult, hell bent on world domination. She is exposed to a mysteries ooze that allows her to transform into a powerful giant! As a new super hero she runs out into the conflict zone to rescue civilians captured by the cult for experimentation. Crack open the POW camps, grab the prisoners and get them back to base sefely.

Key Features

Exciting Game Play

Run around the battle field stomping enemy tanks, dodging missiles, climbing up buildings and snatching the little civilians out of danger to deliver them back to safety at home base. On some missions a fellow soldier will help Wendy by infiltrating the enemy facilities, venturing where she can't in her giant form.

Great Retro Style

Relive the early days of PC gaming with lovingly drawn pixel graphics, made in the style of early 90's VGA games.

content_descriptors.notes: The main character wares a swim suit during most gameplay, and there is some blood splash when some enemies are killed.

detailed_description:
Super Sized Rescue Squad is a fast paced 2D platformer inspired by games like "Jill of the Jungle" and "Choplifter". You play as Wendy Aettridge, a young cargo plane pilot who is thrust into an international conflict when her plane is shot down by an evil cult, hell bent on world domination. She is exposed to a mysteries ooze that allows her to transform into a powerful giant! As a new super hero she runs out into the conflict zone to rescue civilians captured by the cult for experimentation. Crack open the POW camps, grab the prisoners and get them back to base sefely.

Key Features

Exciting Game Play

Run around the battle field stomping enemy tanks, dodging missiles, climbing up buildings and snatching the little civilians out of danger to deliver them back to safety at home base. On some missions a fellow soldier will help Wendy by infiltrating the enemy facilities, venturing where she can't in her giant form.

name: Super Sized Rescue Squad

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Pentium Duo 2.8Ghz or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD2400 Pro or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 85 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 85 MB available space

short_description: Super Sized Rescue Squad is a high energy 2D Platformer where you run, jump, and try to rescue as many little civilians as possible. All while fighting an evil cult hell bent on world domination.
